item.Q:
Write the character:
to gather; to collect; collected works; (classifier for episodes, e.g. of TV series)
item.A:
jí
集中 jízhōng to concentrate; to centralize; to focus; centralized; concentrated; to put together

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to claim
2: balanced; to fit; well-off; suitable
item.A:
称 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 稱
1: chēng 2: chèn
名称 (名稱) míngchēng name (of a thing); name (of an organization) 对称 (對稱) duìchèn symmetry; symmetrical

item.Q:
Write the character:
according to; to act in accordance with; to depend on; to seize; to occupy
item.A:
traditional: 據
jù
根据 (根據) gēnjù according to; based on; basis; foundation

item.Q:
Write the character:
alight; to fall; to drop (behind)
item.A:
落 (strokes unavailable)
luò
落后 (落後) luòhòu to fall behind; to lag (in technology etc); backward; to retrogress

item.Q:
Write the character:
to exceed; to climb over; to surpass; the more ... the more
item.A:
yuè
越冬 yuèdōng (v) go through the winter; overwinter

item.Q:
Write the character:
unexpectedly; actually; to go so far as to; indeed
item.A:
竟 (strokes unavailable)
jìng
究竟 jiūjìng after all (when all is said and done); actually; outcome; result

item.Q:

尽 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 盡
1: jìn 2: jǐn

jí

traditional: 中央集權
zhōngyāngjíquán centralized state power
jiāojí intersection (set theory)

traditional: 先進集體
xiānjìnjítī advanced group
xiānjìnjítǐ collectives
quánjí (n) omnibus; complete works of an artist

traditional: 小集團
xiǎojítuán microfaction
shìjí fair; small town
shōují to gather; to collect
wénjí collected works
mínzhǔjízhōngzhì democratic centralism

traditional: 調集
diàojí assemble

traditional: 選集
xuǎnjí anthology
jízhōng to concentrate; to centralize; to focus; centralized; concentrated; to put together
jíhé a congregation; to gather; a set

traditional: 集團
jítuán group; bloc; corporation

traditional: 集團軍
jítuánjūn Allied army
jíshì (n) country marketplace; open air market

traditional: 集成電路
jíchéngdiànlù integrated circuit; IC

traditional: 集會
jíhuì gather; assembly; meeting

traditional: 集權
jíquán centralized power (hist.), e.g. under an Emperor or party
jíshuǐ catchment

traditional: 集結
jíjié to accumulate; to mass

traditional: 集資
jízī to raise money; to accumulate funds

traditional: 集體
jítǐ collective

traditional: 集體主義
jítīzhǔyì collectivism
jítǐzhǔyì (n) collectivism

traditional: 集體化
jítīhuà collectivize
jítǐhuà collectivization (of agriculture under communism)

traditional: 集體所有制
jítīsuǒyǒuzhì collective ownership

traditional: 中心對稱
zhōngxīnduìchēng centrosymmetry

traditional: 人稱
rénchēng a person's name; person (first person, second person etc in grammar)

traditional: 名稱
míngchēng name (of a thing); name (of an organization)

traditional: 對稱
duìchèn symmetry; symmetrical

traditional: 對稱中心
duìchēngzhōngxīn symmetric point

traditional: 相稱
xiāngchèn (vi) comport
xiāngchēng to address each other

traditional: 稱心
chènxīn satisfactory; agreeable

traditional: 稱號
chēnghào (n) name; term of address; title

traditional: 統稱
tǒngchēng collectively called; common name

traditional: 聲稱
shēngchēng to claim; to state; to proclaim; to assert

traditional: 自稱
zìchēng call oneself; claim to be; profess

traditional: 著稱
zhùchēng to be widely known as

traditional: 號稱
hàochēng (v) be known by reputation as; (v) falsely claim to be sth

traditional: 通稱
tōngchēng the general name for sth; a generic term

traditional: 單據
dānjù receipts; invoices; transaction records

traditional: 據傳
chuán according to rumours

traditional: 據此
jùcǐ according to this; on the ground of the above; (formally introduces reported speech in writing)

traditional: 據說
jùshuō it is said that; reportedly

traditional: 據點
jùdiǎn a stronghold; a defended military base

traditional: 數據
shùjù data; numbers; digital

traditional: 根據
gēnjù according to; based on; basis; foundation

traditional: 根據地
gēnjùdi citadel
gēnjùdì base of operations

traditional: 考據
kǎojù textual criticism

traditional: 論據
lún talking point
xìaluò whereabouts
lìluò agile; nimble; all settled; in order
shīluò (v) lose
rìluò sundown; sunset
duànluò part; paragraph

traditional: 沒落
mòluò downfall
liúluò driftage
luòdì (adj) sth that sits on the floor

traditional: 落實
luòshí to implement; to carry out; fulfill; realize; ensure; make sure; practical; workable

traditional: 落後
luòhòu to fall behind; to lag (in technology etc); backward; to retrogress
luòde (v) end up in; result in
luòchéng to complete a construction project
luòshuǐ to fall into water; to sink; overboard; fig. to degenerate; to sink (into depravity); to go to the dogs
luòkōng to omit; to neglect
bùluò tribe
yuànluò a court; a courtyard

NánYuè South Vietnam; South Vietnamese
nányuè South Vietnam
yuèwèi offside
yuènánrén Vietnamese

traditional: 越權
yuèquán (n) arrogation

traditional: 越過
yuèguò to cross over; to transcend; to cover distance; to overcome; to rise above
jiūjìng after all (when all is said and done); actually; outcome; result
jìngrán unexpectedly

traditional: 一網打盡
yīwǎngdǎjìn round up whole gang in one fell swoop

traditional: 不盡
bùjìn not completely

traditional: 應有盡有
yīngyǒujìnyǒu everything (one could imagine)

traditional: 用盡
yòngjìn to exhaust; to use up completely

traditional: 盡力
jìnlì do one's best (effort); strive as much as possible

traditional: 盡心
jìnxīn with all of one's heart

traditional: 盡情
jìnqíng as much as one likes

traditional: 盡量
jìnliàng as much as possible; to the greatest extent
jǐnliàng as much as possible

traditional: 盡頭
jìntóu the very end
jǐntóu outland
